# Essentia Lock (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[Incarnum (Domain)|Incarnum 4]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F/DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Magic of Incarnum (Wotc), pg. 101

When you cast *essentia lock,* you freeze the subjectâ€™s current allocation of essentia in place. The target is unable to shift essentia to or from any soulmelds, feats, or other essentia receptacles he might possess, and must maintain his current allocation of essentia for the duration of the spell. Creatures without essentia are unaffected by

this spell.

*Arcane Focus:* A tiny padlock made of silver (10 gp).
